Installing DGSEA

May 13, 2020

DGSEA can be found on GitHub at https://github.com/JamesJoly/DGSEA. We are in the process of putting DGSEA on Bioconductor, but for now it can be directly installed using devtools in R:

Check out the Running DGSEA page to run your first analysis. File all bugs/feature requests at DGSEAâ€™s GitHub repo.

Differential Gene Set Enrichment Analysis: A statistical approach to quantify the relative enrichment of two gene sets.
